days.text: Temperature falling slightly. Cold and dry. Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cold. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain at night. Force 3 to 5 easterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
